Articles.Content:
Requirements for challange

1.Launch from Kerbin

2. Use under 25 parts for main shuttle, Use under 15 parts for lander

3.Fly to eeloo and use the lander to succesfully land on Eeloo and plant a flag on

4. take off from eeloo and rendavous with main shuttle

5. Fly back to kerbin and land succsesfully

I will get an example mission together for you guys.

Have any problems or suggestions with this challange email me at [email protected], Thanks

Edited January 21, 2015 by Pepsipopper219
Fixing Some Things

Welcome to the forums!

You might want to read the Challenge Submission Guide and flesh out your challenge a bit, perhaps with an example mission.
Ok, Thank you for the tip. I will get an example mission together for all of you. Thanks again.
